commitMessage:
feat(ui): add haptic feedback and version info display

- Add haptic feedback system with multiple patterns (success, tap, navigate, swipe, toggle)
- Implement version info display with commit message parsing and markdown rendering
- Add "What's New" section to version page showing commit subject and body
- Add showFullNames setting to display player names instead of avatars
- Improve scroll behavior with user/programmatic scroll detection
- Add recent form display for opponent teams in match details
- Fix navigation direction in FloatingNav component
- Add team selection modal for players with multiple teams
- Improve version checking with cache-busting and periodic updates
- Add various UI improvements and bug fixes throughout the application

BREAKING CHANGE: The version.json format now includes additional fields (commitMessage, commitSubject, commitBody)
commitSubject: feat(ui): add haptic feedback and version info display

- Add haptic feedback system with multiple patterns (success, tap, navigate, swipe, toggle)

- Improve scroll behavior with user/programmatic scroll detection
- Add recent form display for opponent teams in match details
- Fix navigation direction in FloatingNav component
- Add team selection modal for players with multiple teams
- Improve version checking with cache-busting and periodic updates
- Add various UI improvements and bug fixes throughout the application
